remarks:
Define a function with domain.  Definition 6.15(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27.  For alternate definitions, see ~ dffn2 , ~ dffn3 , ~ dffn4 , and ~ dffn5 .  (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.) 

---

 Define a function with domain.  Definition 6.15(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 27.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)
statement: df-fn $p |- ( A Fn B <-> ( Fun A /\ dom A = B ) ) $.
